00026 #include "httpserver.h"
00027 #include <QTcpServer>
00028 #include "tcpserver.h"
00029 
00030 #define DBG_PREFIX "HttpContext: "
00031 
00032 HttpServer::HttpServer(const QHostAddress &address, quint16 port, QObject *parent) :
00033     QThread(parent),
00034     address(address),
00035     port(port)
00036 {
00037 }
00038 
00039 HttpServer::~HttpServer()
00040 {
00041 }
00042 
00043 void HttpServer::run()
00044 {
00045     TcpServer *socket = new TcpServer;
00046     connect(socket, SIGNAL(newConnection(int)), this, SLOT(onNewConnection(int)));
00047     connect(this, SIGNAL(finished()), socket, SLOT(deleteLater()));
00048     socket->listen(address, port);
00049     exec();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void HttpServer::onNewConnection(int socketDescriptor)
00053 {
00054     HttpSession *c = incomingConnection(socketDescriptor);
00055     if (c) {
00056         connect(c, SIGNAL(finished()), c, SLOT(deleteLater()));
00057 
00058         c->start();
00059     }
00060 }
